short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes ability to 'like' posts from specified users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that allows you to input the name of people whose posts you don't want to like on Facebook. Once you enter the names, our program will remove the like buttons from those people's posts.
